title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when attempting to close all editors by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that all open files, including f1.txt, should be closed as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file called f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
4. Verify that all open files, including f1.txt, are closed without any prompt or warning.
